cryptocurrencychart
--------------------

Simple wrapper around the crypto currency chart api.  

Installation
------------

```bash
pip install cryptocurrencychart
```

Configuration
-------------
Place a config file with your api key and secret in `~/.cryptocurrencychart` with the following format:

```editorconfig
[default]
KEY = {{API_KEY}}
SECRET = {{API_SECRET}}
BASE_CURRENCY = USD

```
